author: fabiocos
body:
Final MTD scenario for TDR D38 (flat bars along phi)
Fix the ieta BTLDetId navigation method for negative side

(cherry picked from commit ff45d0e76a599b2b5847faf50eb055af9234c3e8)

Restore constexpr in BTLDetId accidentally removed

(cherry picked from commit 780be3d5e7688177a38575ca438a3cbc84061a48)

update crystal thicknesses according to T. Tabarelli's infos

(cherry picked from commit b0ad448c46efef792af2871acbb442d737f8620f)

Update README.md

(cherry picked from commit 95b688c32169a7c899f827ee79a943d7e8b2514e)

backport #25572
title: MTD geometry: add final proposed scenario (flat bars along phi) D38, fix the BTLDetId ieta navigation method [10_4_X backport of 25572]
